sentences.sentence: Keyssar uses these differential rates to help explain a phenomenon that has puzzled historians—the startlingly high rate of geographical mobility in the nineteenth-century United States.
sentences.translation: Keyssar 利用这些不同的比率来帮助解释一个让历史学家困惑的现象——19世纪美国惊人的高地域流动性。
差异这么明显，令人吃惊。

sentences.sentence: They call it “fiendishly simple and startlingly cheap”.
sentences.translation: 他们称之为“极其简单而又令人惊奇的便宜”。
